Buttons

  1. Home
  2. Components
  3. Buttons

Default

Default Button

Use the button classes on an <a>, <button>, or <input> element.

<button type="button" class="btn btn-primary">Primary</button>

Outline

Outline Button

Use the .btn-outline-* classes to quickly create bordered buttons.

<button type="button" class="btn btn-outline-primary">Primary</button>

Rounded

Rounded Button

Add .btn-rounded to buttons to get large rounded corners.

<button type="button" class="btn btn-accent btn-rounded">Accent</button>

Rounded Outline

Rounded Outline Button

Use the .btn-outline-* and .btn-rounded classes together to quickly create bordered buttons with large rounded corners.

<button type="button" class="btn btn-outline-primary btn-rounded">Primary</button>

Icon

Icon Button

Add icons to any button or even use Icon-only buttons.

<button type="button" class="btn btn-light">
  <i class="material-icons">favorite_border</i>
</button>

<button type="button" class="btn btn-light">
  <i class="material-icons icon--left">favorite</i> Favorite
</button>

Size

Button Size

Add .btn-lg or .btn-sm classes for additional button sizes.

<button type="button" class="btn btn-accent btn-lg">Large</button>

Disabled

Disabled Buttons

Add the disabled attribute to disable buttons.

<button type="button" class="btn btn-accent" disabled="">Accent</button>

Block

Button Block

Create block level buttons, by adding add .btn-block.

<button type="button" class="btn btn-block btn-outline-secondary">Block Button</button>

Dropdown

Button dropdown
Action Another action Something else here
Separated link
Action Another action Something else here
Separated link
Action Another action Something else here
Separated link
Action Another action Something else here
Separated link
<div class="btn-group">
  <button type="button" class="btn btn-accent dropdown-toggle" data-toggle="dropdown" aria-haspopup="true" aria-expanded="false">Accent</button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu">
    <a class="dropdown-item" href="#">Action</a>
    <a class="dropdown-item" href="#">Another action</a>
    <a class="dropdown-item" href="#">Something else here</a>
    <div class="dropdown-divider"></div>
    <a class="dropdown-item" href="#">Separated link</a>
  </div>
</div>

Group

Button Group

Create a group of buttons by wrapping with .btn-group.



Dropdown link Dropdown link

Dropdown link Dropdown link
<div class="btn-group">
  <button type="button" class="btn btn-light">Left</button>
  <button type="button" class="btn btn-light">Middle</button>
  <button type="button" class="btn btn-light">Right</button>
</div>
